test-case.name: Validate Behavior when fields are blank during sign up

test-step.name: Validate that all the Fields that are blank are highlighted in red

report.desc: Navigate to https://facebook.com
[Submit Button Button] Click element
Verify that FirstName is focused and is showing a tooltip with Message: "What's your name?"
Verify that LastName field is highlighted in red
Verify that Mobile/Email field is highlighted in red
Verify that Password field is highlighted in red
[Password TextBox TextBox] Unable to locate element
Verify that Password field is not highlighted in red
Verify that Gender Radio Buttons are highlighted in red

test-step.name: Validate that if a textbox field is focused, that field will display a tooltip

report.desc: [LastName TextBox TextBox] Click element
Verify that LastName is focused and is showing a tooltip with Message: "What's your name?"
Verify that FirstName field is highlighted in red
[Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Click element
Verify that Mobile/Email is focused and is showing a tooltip with Message: "You’ll use this when you log in and if you ever need to reset your password."
Verify that LastName field is highlighted in red

test-step.name: Validate that if a Gender is selected, the red highlight disappears

report.desc: [Male Radio Button RadioButton] Click element
Verify that Gender Radio Buttons are not highlighted in red after selecting a gender

test-step.name: Validate that if all the text fields are populated the red highlight disappears

report.desc: [FirstName TextBox TextBox] Type "Tester"
[LastName TextBox TextBox] Type "Tester"
[Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "Tester3241@gmail.com"
[Mobile or Email Confirm TextBox TextBox] Type "Tester3241@gmail.com"
[Birthday Day Dropdown] Select Text "2"
[Birthday Month Dropdown] Select Text "Aug"
[Birthday Year Dropdown] Select Text "1986"
[Password TextBox TextBox] Type "Password1!"
[Male Radio Button RadioButton] Click element
Verify that FirstName field is not highlighted in red
Verify that LastName field is not highlighted in red
Verify that Mobile/Email field is not highlighted in red
Verify that Password field is not highlighted in red

test-case.name: Validate FirstName and LastName Field Signup Requirement

test-step.name: Validate that if you enter numbers as FirstName, error should be displayed

report.desc: [FirstName TextBox TextBox] Type "1234567"
[Submit Button Button] Click element
Verify that if you enter a number in the first name, error should show upon sign up

test-step.name: Validate that if you enter numbers as LastName, error should be displayed

report.desc: [LastName TextBox TextBox] Type "1234567"
[Submit Button Button] Click element
Verify that if you enter a number in the last name, error should show upon sign up
[FirstName TextBox TextBox] Type "Tester"
[LastName TextBox TextBox] Type "Tester"

test-case.name: Validate Email/Mobile Number Field Signup Requirement

test-step.name: Validate that if the value for the Mob/Email is a mobile number that doesnt have the right number of digits it should throw an error

report.desc: [Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "1"
[Mobile or Email Confirm TextBox TextBox] Unable to locate element
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is highlighted in red when number of digit is less than 10
[Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "42589254161111"
[Mobile or Email Confirm TextBox TextBox] Unable to locate element
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is highlighted in red when number of digit is greater than 10
[Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "425892541A"
[Mobile or Email Confirm TextBox TextBox] Unable to locate element
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is highlighted in red when there is a letter on the set of numbers

test-step.name: Validate that if an invalid email is entered, the field should display a tooltip

report.desc: [Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "invalidemailaddress"
Verify that Mobile/Email field is highlighted in red

test-step.name: Validate that if an emasil is entered, a new field will appear below the email where you have to enter your email again for confirmation

report.desc: [Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "validEmailAddress@gmail.com"
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is shown

test-step.name: Validate that if the confirmation Mob/Email field is not the same as the Mob/Email field, the confirmation field should be highlighted

report.desc: [Mobile or Email Confirm TextBox TextBox] Type "validEmailAddresDifferents@gmail.com"
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is highlighted in red

test-step.name: Validate that if the confirmation Mob/Email field is the same as the Mob/Email field, the confirmation field should not be highlighted

report.desc: [Mobile or Email Confirm TextBox TextBox] Type "validEmailAddress@gmail.com"
[Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "validEmailAddress@gmail.com"
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is not highlighted in red

test-step.name: Validate that if the value for the Mob/Email is changed to a Mobile number, the Confirmation field should disappear

report.desc: [Mobile or Email TextBox TextBox] Type "4258925416"
Verify that Confirmation Mob/Email field is not displayed

test-step.name: Validate that if password is less than 6 characters, error should show upon sign up

report.desc: [Password TextBox TextBox] Type "a"
[Submit Button Button] Click element
Verify that if password is less than 6 characters, error should show upon sign up

test-step.name: Validate that if password contains only letters, error should show upon sign up

report.desc: [Password TextBox TextBox] Type "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaa"
[Submit Button Button] Click element
Verify that if password contains only letters, error should show upon sign up

test-step.name: Validate that if password contains only numbers, error should show upon sign up

report.desc: [Password TextBox TextBox] Type "111111111111"
[Submit Button Button] Click element
Verify that if password contains only numbers, error should show upon sign up
